lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps was on course to win the 23rd Olympic swimming medal of his career after being named in the U.S. 4x100 meters  freestyle relay team on Sunday.

headline.main: Swimming: Phelps Named in U.S. 4x100 Freestyle Relay
headline.print_headline: Swimming: Phelps Named in U.S. 4x100 Freestyle Relay
